content.body: Where did we land on currency amounts? Are they exported via the `unit` getter?
content.formatted_body: Where did we land on currency amounts? Are they exported via the unit getter?

content.body: (we can change in Stage 2 but I want to make sure Intl Unit Protocol is up to date)
I intend to copy the Intl spec from Amount into Intl Unit Protocol as late as possible before the deadline

yes, with no special treatment other than "_Unit identifiers consisting of three upper-case ASCII letters will be formatted with `style: 'currency'`_": https://github.com/tc39/proposal-amount?tab=readme-ov-file#units-including-currency
content.formatted_body: yes, with no special treatment other than "Unit identifiers consisting of three upper-case ASCII letters will be formatted with style: 'currency'": https://github.com/tc39/proposal-amount?tab=readme-ov-file#units-including-currency

content.body: I added my two proposals to the agenda, pending the spec availability for Intl Unit Protocol: https://github.com/tc39/agendas/commit/f6f0435b4ceda82c31f997b02473ffb15027dbd7
